apihelp-mscalendargetmonth-summary: API module for retrieving events for a specific month in a calendar.
apihelp-mscalendarsavenew-summary: API module for saving a new event in a calendar.
apihelp-mscalendarupdate-summary: API module for updating an existing event in a calendar.
apihelp-mscalendarremove-summary: API module for removing an event from a calendar.
